greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm(n, n - phi(n)).
comment: See also A009195, A003277, A050384 when totient and cototient give results identical to each other. This sequence is not identical to A009262.
a(n) = n iff n is in A246655. - _Ivan Neretin_, May 29 2016
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 20 2000
